\nTo obtain your free Supadata API Key,: To obtain your free Supadata API Key, sign up at [Supadata](https://supadata.ai) and then copy the key available in the [dashboard](https://dash.supadata.ai).
Fetches transcript of a YouTube video.
The URL of a single YouTube video.
Preferred language of the transcript. If: Preferred language of the transcript. If not available, the first available language will be returned.
If true, the transcript will be merged i: If true, the transcript will be merged into a single text instead of timestamped chunks.
